de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.system

Interface HardwarePlatform

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cubieboard3, RaspberryPi3, Windows

    public interface HardwarePlatform
    Defines functions which are dependant on the board hardware or low level configuration of the operating system.
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectToMobileInternet()
      Use some driver to start a daemon process which handles mobile internet connection.
      Hciconfig getBluetoothController()
      Get the local Bluetooth controller.
      boolean printInternetInterfaceInfo()
      Print infos about the interface which is used by the mobile internet connection.
      void setLEDstateERROR()
      Turn off a LED on the board.
      void setLEDstateRECORDING()
      Set a LED on the board to blink in a "Heartbeat" pattern.
      void setLEDstateSTANDBY()
      Set a LED on the board to blink slowly.

    • Method Detail

      • setLEDstateSTANDBY

        void setLEDstateSTANDBY()
        Set a LED on the board to blink slowly.

      • setLEDstateRECORDING

        void setLEDstateRECORDING()
        Set a LED on the board to blink in a "Heartbeat" pattern.

      • setLEDstateERROR

        void setLEDstateERROR()
        Turn off a LED on the board.

      • getBluetoothController

        Hciconfig getBluetoothController()
        Get the local Bluetooth controller.
        Returns:
        Hciconfig object for interacting with hciconfig console tool

      • printInternetInterfaceInfo

        boolean printInternetInterfaceInfo()
                            throws SocketException,
                                   NullPointerException
        Print infos about the interface which is used by the mobile internet connection.
        Returns:
        true if it is up, false otherwise
        Throws:
        SocketException - if interface is not up and running
        NullPointerException - if interface is not up and running

      • connectToMobileInternet

        void connectToMobileInternet()
        Use some driver to start a daemon process which handles mobile internet connection.
